subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer beat Gaël Monfils of France, 6-3, 6-4, on Thursday to advance to the quarterfinals of the Monte Carlo Masters. The top-ranked Federer will play sixth-seeded David Nalbandian, who routed No. 12 Tommy Robredo, 6-1, 6-0. The three-time defending champion, Rafael Nadal, beat Juan Carlos Ferrero, 6-4, 6-1; third-seeded Novak Djokovic of Serbia topped No. 14 Andy Murray, 6-0, 6-4; No. 4 Nikolay Davydenko of Russia defeated No. 16 Philipp Kohlschreiber, 3-6, 7-5, 6-2; and Sam Querrey of the United States upset No. 7 Richard Gasquet, 2-6, 6-4, 6-3.
